experience.title: Full Stack Developer
info: Designed and developed a platform enabling doctors, patients, and manufacturers to collaborate, share data, and analyze the creation of personalized medical devices.
Utilized a tech stack including Node.js, Express, Angular, and CouchDB for robust and scalable application development.
Integrated AWS tools such as Elastic Beanstalk, EC2, Cognito and S3 for deployment, authentication, and cloud services.
Conducted code reviews, debugged issues, and implemented solutions to ensure seamless functionality.
Oversaw and managed development milestones, driving progress from concept to successful delivery.

experience.title: Lead React Developer
info: Developed web applications for Windstream CCS using React, leveraging tools such as Redux, Tailwind, and Material UI.
Utilized React Hooks, Formik, and WebSockets, and implemented a live chat feature with mqtt.js.
Modernized legacy codebases, enhancing functionality and aligning with current development standards.
Maintained expertise in React state management strategies, ensuring efficient and scalable application performance.
Led a team of five React developers to rebuild the platform from the ground up, delivering a high-quality and robust solution.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
info: Developed and maintained eCommerce websites for hardware product sales using PHP, MySQL, and Bootstrap, ensuring a seamless user experience and scalability for high-traffic environments.
Integrated third-party payment gateways such as PayPal and Stripe, as well as shipping APIs, to streamline the checkout process and improve user convenience.
Implemented responsive design principles to ensure optimal performance across various devices, enhancing user engagement and satisfaction.
